inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: He presents with shortness of breath, chest tightening and cough. He was admitted to the emergency department with diagnosis of severe asthma exacerbation.

exclusion.criterion: the asthma control, participation in other drug trial, and a patient or all caregiver(s) (in case the patient is a child) incapable to read Swedish.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has asthma and meets some of the inclusion criteria, but it's unclear if their asthma control score is less than 20. They do not meet any exclusion criteria.
